On May 25th. The Board of Directors along with delegation from Seattle convened in Tigray Community Center and nominated Ato. Berhane Tkue for the second term.

The new appointment of Ato. Berhane is widely seen as a vote of confidence for his leadership and was given a mandate to follow thru the completion of the library.
